item.title: Linux 常用命令
item.description: 设置 JAVA_HOME export JAVA_HOME="$(dirname $(dirname $(realpath $(which javac))))" cat EOF追加与覆盖 1. 覆盖 #!/bin/bash cat > /root/test.txt <<EOF Hello! My site is www.361way.com My site is www.91it.org Test for cat and EOF! EOF 2. 追加 #!/bin/bash cat >> /root/test.txt <<EOF Hello! My site is www.361way.com My site is www.91it.org Test for cat and EOF! EOF 如果EOF改
